cause.description:
WORC is a regional network of seven grassroots community organizations that include 9,700 members and 47 local chapters. WORC helps its member groups succeed by providing training and coordinating issue work.
Our Member Organizations are:
* Dakota Rural Action (SD) * Dakota Resource Council (ND) * Idaho Rural Council * Northern Plains Resource Council (MT) * Oregon Rural Action * Powder River Basin Resource Council (WY) * Western Colorado Congress
WORC’s mission is to advance the vision of a democratic, sustainable, and just society through community action. WORC is committed to building sustainable environmental and economic communities that balance economic growth with the health of people and stewardship of their land, water, and air resources.
1. Family-scale farms and ranches are better for our environment, our economy, and our communities than corporate agriculture
2. Clean water and healthy land are vital for our generation and the next
3. People should be empowered to participate in the decisions that affec their lives
cause.mission: organize westerners to protect our family farms and ranches, clean air and water, and unique quality of life
cause.name: Western Organization of Resource Councils
